sen.e: After killing Nobunaga at Honnoji Temple, he played a lively part in a battle against Hideyoshi Toyotomi, who had returned from the Chugoku Region, (the Battle of Yamazaki), serving as one of the vanguard; however, the forces led by him were defeated, which resulted in him fleeing.
sen.cmt: 「敗れて逃走した」：「敗れる」の主語は、「利三が率いた軍勢」としました。利三は参加者の一人であり、彼だけが敗れたわけではないので、利三を主語にすると不自然に感じられるからです。
sen.e: After succesfuly doing away with Nobunaga at Honnoji Temple, he took an active role in the Battle of Yamazaki, which was fought against Hideyoshi Toyotomi upon his return from the Chugoku Region; however, his forces were routed and he fled.

sen.e: When Toshimitsu left the Inaba clan for the Akechi clan, Ittetsu INABA requested Nobunaga ODA to cause him to return to the service of Toshimitsu, and Nobunaga recommended Toshimitsu to do so.

sen.j: しかし明智光秀が「人がこだわるほどの良臣を蓄えなくては上様（織田信長）のもとで大功を挙げられませぬ」と述べて拒絶したとされている。
sen.e: It is said, however, that Mitsuhide AKECHI, a retainer of Nobunaga ODA, rejected Nobunaga's recommendation, saying, "I need to have such good retainers as to be persistently wanted by any lord so that I can render distinguished service to the Lord."

It is said, however, that Mitsuhide AKECHI rejected Nobunaga's recommendation, declaring, "If I can't retain men of such calbier as to be persistently wanted by other lord's, I won't be capable of rendering distinguished service to my Lord (i.e., Nobunaga ODA)."
